item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi. ðŸ”—My name is Andrewâ€”that’s a pen name. I’m a current high school student, a writer, a musician, and a cyclist. I also like to mess around with computers and programming on occasion. I’m in a unique position regarding school, and that’ll be one of the main topics of this blog. I went to public school for kindergarten, but for a number of reasons which I’ll talk about in a later article, my mom decided to pull me out of public school.
